name: careerwave-monorepo
description: CareerWave - Job Portal with Frontend and Backend

scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build
scripts.vercel-build: echo 'Building frontend and backend...' && cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm install && npm run build
